translation.zh: 十六块五给你，十六块五给我

translation.en: Soon as I get my check, I'm gone.
-Dwight, I need my check. -Payday's at the end of the month.
translation.zh:
-特怀特，走之前把钱给我
-发薪日在月底

translation.en: You haven't paid us for last month. I need money, Loretta's got a kid--
translation.zh:
你还欠我们上个月薪水
我需要钱，洛雷塔还要养孩子...

translation.en: Problem with management? Put a note in the suggestion box.
translation.zh:
对我的管理有意见
可以往意见箱里投信

translation.en: -I'm serious. I'm quitting. -I'll be back for the dinner shift.
translation.zh:
-我不是在开玩笑，我要辞职
-我值晚班的时候回来

translation.en: I sure as hell won't be.
I'm taking what he owes me, not a penny more.
translation.zh:
我在拿他欠我的钱
多一分都不会拿

translation.en: You take that money, he's gonna come after you.
translation.zh: 你这么拿钱他不会放过你的

translation.en: -Gotta find me first. -What you gonna do?
translation.zh:
-除非他能找到我
-你准备干什么？

translation.en: This ought to cover that bike for little Keith.
translation.zh: 这些钱够给小基思买辆自行车了

translation.en: You're late to pick him up.
Go. I got everything covered here.
That bike can wait till Christmas.
translation.zh: 自行车可以等到圣诞节再买

translation.en: You keep what he owes you. I'll deal with Dwight, okay?
translation.zh:
拿好特怀特欠你的钱
剩下的交给我

-单程还是往返？
-你在开玩笑吧？

translation.en: Hey, Coco. Coco Puff, you're on. Come on. You're on, you're on.
translation.zh: 可可，可可泡芙，准备上场

translation.en: ...but we do have the best view on Sunset Strip.
translation.zh: 但是我们拥有日落大道最美的风景

translation.en: What is this place, a strip club?
translation.zh: 这里是什么地方？脱衣舞俱乐部？

translation.en: I should wash your mouth out with Jägermeister.
translation.zh: 我真应该用野格酒冲洗你的嘴巴

translation.en: The only Pole you'll find in there is Natasha, the shot girl.
translation.zh:
这里唯一的杆子
就是那个小个姑娘娜塔莎

translation.en: Babycakes, I got a club to fill here.
Put your money in my hand
If you got a little extra
Well, give it to the band

translation.zh: 但不能满足你每个愿望

translation.en: Put your money in my hand
If you want a little extra
Well, you know where I am
It's not the end of days
It's just the bump and grind
-Can I get you a drink? -Only if you're buying.
translation.zh:
-能为你点杯喝的吗？
-你请客就行

translation.en: -Kentucky. We're practically related. -Thought you looked familiar.
translation.zh:
-肯塔基，两个地方靠得很近
-难怪你看起来很眼熟

translation.en: Hey, sweetheart? You wanna do your job? Let's go.
Who does a girl have to flirt with to get from here to up there?
translation.zh:
女孩们找谁卖弄风情
就可以从台下调到台上？

translation.en: With someone wearing more eyeliner than me? Yeah.
translation.zh: 和比我眼线画得还重的人？是的

-她就是你要找的人，讨好她
-谢谢

translation.en: Hold it! Hold it. That's good.
We're on in five minutes. Five minutes, ladies.
Does anyone know where Nikki is?
translation.zh: 有人知道妮基去哪里了吗？

translation.en: Both spotlights are supposed to pull in.
translation.zh: 两台聚光灯都应该照过去

translation.en: Georgia, your boyfriend is so cute.
translation.zh: 乔治亚，你男朋友真可爱

translation.en: So tonight, takeout and a movie?
translation.zh: 今天晚上，吃外卖还是看电影？

translation.en: Tess! I lost a contact on the stage.
Okay, if you fall off the stage, leg extended, boobs up.
translation.zh: 如果你掉下舞台，伸直腿挺起胸

translation.en: Yeah, the foot, the back, the neck.
The hips, the breasts, the face....
Vince, the sink's busted upstairs again.
translation.zh: 文思，楼上的水池又堵了

translation.en: I'm not calling a plumber, Coco.
translation.zh: 我不会打电话找水管工的，可可

translation.en: Tess, have you read this letter from the bank?
translation.zh: 泰丝，看了这封银行寄来的信吗？

translation.en: How many times have I told you? No business during business hours.
translation.zh:
和你说了很多次了
营业的时候不提这个

translation.en: -Marcus Gerber is coming in tonight. -So what?
translation.zh:
-马科斯戈柏今晚会过来
-那又怎样？

translation.en: You won't talk to me before the show, after the show.
translation.zh: 表演前后你都不和我说话

translation.en: I didn't divorce you to spend more time with you.
translation.zh:
我和你离婚
不是为了有更多时间和你相处

translation.en: I may not be "Mr. Tess" anymore, but I still own half this place.
translation.zh:
虽然我不再是〝泰丝先生〞
但我还是这里半个老板

translation.en: Nice, but it won't pay the bills.
translation.zh: 很好，但是这也付不了账单

translation.en: Excuse me, I'm looking for Tess.
And you are in my mirror because?
Oh, sorry. I'm friends with Jack, and I'm looking for a job.
translation.zh:
抱歉，我是杰克的朋友
我正在找工作

translation.en: At home, mostly. But I can move.
translation.zh: 大多在家里，不过我很能扭

translation.en: Okay, give your name and number to Sean.
translation.zh: 好的，把你的名字和电话留给肖恩

translation.en: Let you know when we're having our audition.
translation.zh: 有面试的时候会通知你

translation.en: -Where the hell is Nikki? -I don't know. She's late again.
translation.zh:
-妮基去哪里了？
-不知道，她又迟到了

translation.en: We're trying to put on a show here. Come back another time.
I've never seen anything like this.
translation.zh: 我以前从来没见过这种演出

translation.en: -I need a job. I wanna work here. -Great enthusiasm, terrible timing.
translation.zh:
-我需要工作，我想在这里工作
-精神可嘉，时机不对

translation.en: So leave your name and your number with Jack, your friend downstairs.
translation.zh:
把你的名字和电话
留给你楼下的朋友杰克

translation.en: And we'll call you. Okay? Promise.
translation.zh: 我们会和你联系的，好吗？

translation.en: Hey, can you fix this for me?
You're probably not gonna believe this...
...but Sean and I were talking, and he said....
translation.zh: 肖恩和我刚才谈话的时候，他说...

translation.en: I said, "It's so sad that Nikki couldn't join us for the opening number...
translation.zh:
我说，〝妮基没能参加开场表演
太遗憾了...

translation.en: ...but it would be so great if she joined us for the next one."
translation.zh: 要是她能赶上下一场就太好了〞

translation.en: Paws and claws. Took longer than I thought.
translation.zh: 没想到做指甲花了这么长时间

translation.en: So is finding a new job when I fire you.
translation.zh: 等我辞了你找新工作也要很久

translation.en: Extra dry, straight up, three olives.

translation.zh:
-快点拿来
-她不是这里的工作人员

translation.en: Your mama tell you it's not polite to stare?
translation.zh:
你母亲没告诉过你
盯着别人看不礼貌吗？

translation.en: You're just so damn beautiful, I--
Well, in that case, screw your mama and stare away.
translation.zh:
既然如此，别管你妈了
尽管看吧

translation.en: Goddamn it! Don't touch my stuff!
...and tough guy with the hat over there, he wants a Cosmo.
translation.zh:
那边戴帽子的男人
要一杯大都会鸡尾酒

translation.en: If I'm not better than boobs-for-brains, you don't have to pay me.
translation.zh:
如果我要比那些胸大无脑的小妞差劲
你就不用付钱

translation.en: Isn't that the girl that was backstage?
translation.zh: 那是昨晚来后台的姑娘吗？

translation.en: Hey, Jack, what's she doing here?
And so she is our new waitress.
translation.zh: 所以她是我们的新服务员

translation.en: And when did I make you head of personnel?
translation.zh: 我什么时候让你负责人事了？

translation.en: She just picked up a tray, started working.
translation.zh: 她拿起托盘就开始工作了

translation.en: Look, this is cute, but come on.
translation.zh: 这个看起来很可爱，不过...

translation.en: Push up those boobs. Got them, show them. Work them.
translation.zh: 把胸挺起来，有料就要派上用场

translation.en: And don't ever go behind my back again.
-Yes, ma'am. -And don't ever call me ma'am again.
-Yes, sir. I mean ma'am. I mean Tess. -Get on the floor.
Dewar's rocks and a bottle of your best champagne.
translation.zh:
帝王威士忌加冰
和一瓶你们这里最好的香槟

translation.en: Oh, and will you tell Nikki that I'm here?
translation.zh: 还有，告诉妮基我在这里
从91年开始就是这里的会员

translation.en: You're late, you're late for a very important date.
What is that waitress doing here? I want that bitch out now.
translation.zh:
那个服务员在这里干什么？
我要那个贱人离开

translation.en: What did she ever do to you?
-She told me I look like a drag queen. -Can't be the first time.
translation.zh:
-她说我看起来像易装皇后
-不是第一次有人对你这么说吧

translation.en: Ali. Ali. What do you need?

translation.zh: 帝王威士忌加冰和一瓶法国廊酒

translation.en: Yep. So he's a regular, huh?
Dating Nikki. This week at least.
translation.zh: 这个星期在和妮基约会

translation.en: I wanna be up there. I wanna do that.
Ooh, I've got a dentist, baby
The man is over seven feet tall
His name is Dr. Long John
I assume all your financial obligations...
translation.zh: 我承担你所有的经济债务

translation.en: ...pay you a million right off the top.
Where is the partnership that--? You said there was gonna be a partnership.
translation.zh:
怎么没有提到合作关系？
你说过是合作关系

translation.en: Partnerships don't really work so well with me.
Good. Because I lead with my final offer.
translation.zh: 很好，因为这就是我的底价

translation.en: Not that I give a shit, but why is it that you want my club so badly?
translation.zh:
虽然我不在乎，但你为什么
这么想要我的俱乐部？

translation.en: I see something I like, I have to have it. Since I was a kid.
translation.zh: 从小我喜欢的东西就一定要得到

translation.en: That must have made you very popular in the sandbox.
translation.zh: 那你在沙池玩耍时一定是人气王

translation.en: You know what you could do with that?
translation.zh: 有了这笔钱你知道你能做什么吗？

translation.en: You know what you could do with that money?

translation.zh:
-现在不提这个
-别和我说这些

translation.en: ...you're in a fix and I'm in a position to help.
translation.zh:
你们现在进退两难
我是来帮助你们的

translation.en: We play this thing right, and we all come out winners.
translation.zh: 好好协商我们都会是赢家

translation.en: You got that balloon payment due on the first.
translation.zh: 别忘了你一号要付一大笔贷款

translation.en: Did you also tell him I have a tattoo on my ass?
translation.zh: 你还告诉他了我屁股上有纹身？

translation.en: I don't think you're gonna get another opportunity like this.
translation.zh: 这个条件错过就不会再有

translation.en: No, no. "Not now" means not now, Vince.
translation.zh:
不，〝不是现在〞
就是〝不是现在〞，文思

translation.en: Marcus, I don't care what you're offering.
translation.zh: 马科斯，不管你开什么价

translation.en: My club is not for sale.
Wendy! Do you have my makeup?
translation.zh: 温迪，你拿了我的化妆品吗？

translation.en: Here's mud in your eye, Nik.
All right. Now I got a buzz, and you gotta change. You're on.
translation.zh:
好了，我喝过酒了
你去换衣服准备上场

translation.en: In case you haven't noticed, Vince was talking to Marcus.
translation.zh:
可能你没注意到
文思刚在和马科斯谈话

translation.en: Well, that's because Marcus is trying to buy my club.
translation.zh: 因为马科斯想买我的俱乐部

translation.en: Tess? Probably not a good time.
translation.zh: 泰丝？可能现在不是个好时机

translation.en: I know you're busy and I don't mean to interrupt.
translation.zh: 我知道你很忙，我不想打搅你

translation.en: Hey! Did anybody talk to Dave about the new vocals?
translation.zh: 有人和戴夫谈过新的录音歌曲吗？

translation.en: That's what I've been thinking about.

translation.zh:
-所有的姑娘都是对口型
-除了泰丝

translation.en: But wouldn't it be great if we actually heard the girls sing?
translation.zh:
如果姑娘们能真正唱出来
会不会更好？

translation.en: People come here to watch the dancers dance...
translation.zh: 客人来这是为了观看舞者跳舞...

translation.en: ...and to watch them lip-sync to the great singers.
I hear you. I get it.
I'm just thinking of ways to make it better.
translation.zh: 我就是想让表演更加精彩

translation.en: I don't understand why we can't try--
You don't understand because it's above your pay grade.
translation.zh: 你不明白是因为这不关你的事

translation.en: I don't get what that means. Hear me out. This is a good idea--
translation.zh:
我不知道那是什么意思
听我说，我有个好主意...

translation.en: Ali, Ali, no-- No. No. No.
Stop. Take her and remove her.
They need you on the floor, but thanks for visiting.
translation.zh: 楼下需要你，谢谢你来探班

translation.en: All right. Oh, this is not for anybody.
translation.zh: 不是每个人都适合这件

translation.en: You look so beautiful right now. I can't even tell you.
translation.zh: 你看起来美得让人炫目

translation.en: And you are so full of shit.
You can just have a seat.
I'm gonna grab us both a drink, yeah?
No parents or siblings, aunts, uncles, anyone?
translation.zh: 父母，兄弟姐妹，叔叔阿姨？

translation.en: So you're not here to use my phone.
translation.zh: 这么说你不是来打电话的

translation.en: No, no, stop. It's gonna be all right.
Till it's light out and I can figure out my next move.
translation.zh: 天一亮我就能想出下一步该做什么了

translation.en: Nothing that's ready to be heard.
Because I looked around and realized...
translation.zh: 因为我看着周围的人，意识到...

translation.en: ...there wasn't one person whose life I wanted.
translation.zh: 我不想过他们那样的生活

translation.en: I'm really glad I don't have to be alone tonight.
translation.zh: 还好今晚不是我一个人度过

translation.en: I took the liberty of making breakfast.
I hope you don't mind. It's the least I could do.
translation.zh: 希望你别介意，我只能做这些

translation.en: -Wait, why? -I don't know. The day bed, eyeliner.
You know, it works at the club, Tess loves it--
translation.zh: 在俱乐部工作，泰丝喜欢我们那样

translation.en: I should put on some pants.
So where is she, this fiancée?
She's in New York doing a play.
Now that you're straight and engaged...
...I feel really weird I came here in the first place.
translation.zh: 我当初来你家就感觉很怪

translation.en: -I'll be out of your hair in no time. -You don't have to leave.
I got a plan. If you could just get the door for me.
Get your ass back in my house.
All right, all right, fine. Here we go.
Put me down. What are you doing?
translation.zh: 把我放下来，你在干什么？

translation.en: You have nowhere to go and I have a couch.
translation.zh: 你没地方可以去，这里有沙发

translation.en: Like it or not, you're gonna stay.
translation.zh: 不管喜不喜欢，你得再住几天

translation.en: Oh, God, please don't have the flu.
Why do they call it morning sickness...
...if it hits you at every fricking moment of the day?
translation.zh: 明明是时时刻刻都想吐

translation.en: Well, sweetheart, you know, at some point he's going to notice.
He's not gonna notice until my belly's blocking the TV.
translation.zh:
我的肚子不大到能挡住电视
他是不会注意到的

translation.en: Well, what are you gonna do?
I don't know, Tess. I'm really scared.
Whatever you decide, we will take care of you. Okay?
translation.zh:
不管你决定怎么做
我们都会照顾你的

translation.en: But you've got to tell Damon.
I figured as long as he doesn't know...
...I can still pretend he's gonna be excited about it.
translation.zh:
我就能假装
他会对这个消息感到很开心

translation.en: He's gonna be thrilled. Are you kidding? He'll be thrilled.
What happened to all the great dancers in L.A.?
translation.zh: 洛杉矶那些好舞者都去哪了？
他们都去上选秀节目去了

translation.en: Call Andre and ask. He might have somebody.
translation.zh: 打电话给安德烈问他有没有人

translation.en: Don't like her, I don't like her.
I don't love any of them. She's the best one.
translation.zh: 我一个都不喜欢，她是最好的

translation.en: Hold on a second, I can do this.
And I think it's sweet that you think you can.
-Tell me what you're looking for. -Someone who can do the routine.
translation.zh:
-告诉我你想要什么人
-我要能表演常规舞的人

translation.en: Excuse me? I'm talking to you!
translation.zh: 你说什么？我在和你说话

translation.en: Just tell me what you want.
You gotta make me believe that you belong up there.
translation.zh: 你得让我相信你属于那里

translation.en: That you own that stage and that nobody's gonna take it from you.
translation.zh: 你能占领那个舞台，没人能取代你

translation.en: You wanna show me something, show me that.
translation.zh:
如果你想在我面前表现
那就做吧

translation.en: Which number do you wanna see? I know every one.
translation.zh:
你想要看哪支舞蹈？
每支舞蹈我都会

translation.en: -Every number? -Which one do you wanna see?
Well, I couldn't keep my eyes off her.
You were off the whole last half.
translation.zh: 整个后半段都没踩到节奏

translation.en: Come on, Tess. Come on, I'll practice till I bleed. I know I can do this.
translation.zh:
拜托了，泰丝
我一定会全力以赴，我能做到的

translation.en: You know, we have better dancers.
translation.zh: 我们有跳得更好的舞者

translation.en: Then say thank you very much and goodbye.
If you just give me a chance. I swear I won't disappoint you.
translation.zh:
如果你给我机会
我发誓我不会让你失望的

translation.en: Didn't anybody ever give you a shot?
translation.zh: 以前有人也给过你机会吧

translation.en: Please, I want this so bad.
translation.zh: 求你了，我非常想要这份工作

translation.en: -If you just give me a chance, I'd-- -All right. God!
translation.zh:
-如果你给我一个机会，我会...
-好了，天呐

translation.en: What are you so excited about? She's your replacement.
translation.zh:
你为什么那么兴奋
她是取代你的人

translation.en: Thank you, Tess. You won't regret it.
translation.zh: 谢谢，泰丝，你不会后悔的

translation.en: I am so gonna regret this.

translation.zh: 爱丽是哪个名字的简称？

translation.en: Well, sorry for the short notice...
And with my new raise, I will be off your couch in no time.
translation.zh:
有了我的新收入
我很快就可以搬离你家沙发
第二支〝四轮马车〞穿那个

translation.en: Swarovski bustier, that's for the third number.
translation.zh: 施华洛世奇胸衣第三支舞穿

translation.en: And this is for "Miss Otis Regrets."
translation.zh: 这件是〝奥提斯小姐的遗憾〞时穿

translation.en: You like her. I know it kills you, but you have to admit it.
translation.zh: 你喜欢她，你不承认也不行

translation.en: No. You know, she pulls focus, she doesn't blend in.
translation.zh:
不，她能吸引观众注意力
但她不太合群

translation.en: A girl that doesn't blend in?
Here we go, here we go. Don't lose those again.
My boobs are pushed up to my ears, my thong's a mile up my butt...
translation.zh:
我的胸部快推到我的耳朵
我的丁字裤穿得很靠上

translation.en: ...and my eyelashes are so thick they could kick up a stiff wind.
translation.zh: 我的眼睫毛厚得可以扇风

translation.en: Fun being a girl, isn't it? Come on, let's go, let's go.
translation.zh:
做女人很有意思对吗？
快，走吧，走吧

translation.en: -You guys wanna go grab pizza? -Yes, please.
That brush isn't working. It's too old.
translation.zh: 那个刷子不好用，太旧了

translation.en: Well, it's the only brush I have.
All right, here. Let me help you.
Wet it if you're gonna get a clean line.
translation.zh: 要把眼线画利落得先浸湿眼线笔

translation.en: When you are putting on your makeup...
But instead of painting on a canvas...
My mom was a model and she was beautiful.
translation.zh:
我母亲以前是一位模特
她非常美丽

translation.en: Body that could stop a truck.
And she had these girlfriends, beautiful girls, Colleen and Shirley...
translation.zh: 她有一些漂亮的女友，柯林和雪莉

translation.en: ...and they would come over in the morning...
...and put their makeup on together before they went on jobs. Up.
translation.zh: 一起化妆然后去工作，睁开眼

translation.en: We had a window in the back of our house with a ledge...
translation.zh: 我家后面有一扇有着窗台的大窗户

translation.en: ...and they would put their mirrors side by side and put out their makeup.
translation.zh:
她们把镜子并排放好
拿出自己的化妆品

translation.en: They had lipsticks and blushes, and it was fabulous.
translation.zh: 她们有唇膏和腮红，非常漂亮

translation.en: I kept thinking, "God, I cannot wait till I get old enough to play with this."
translation.zh:
我总是想〝天呐，我想快点
长大到可以化妆的年龄〞

translation.en: Didn't you ever watch your mom put on her makeup?
My mom died when I was 7...
translation.zh: 我母亲去世的时候我七岁

translation.en: You know, you won't be the new girl forever.
Ali. Did you use my towel again?
translation.zh: 爱丽，你又用我的毛巾了？

translation.en: I found it soaking wet on the floor.
translation.zh: 毛巾湿漉漉地扔在地上

translation.en: -I don't know. Maybe. -How's that apartment hunt?
translation.zh:
-我不知道，可能吧
-公寓找得怎么样？

translation.en: I've been looking. Everything's over 1000 bucks a month.
translation.zh:
我一直在找
哪里都要一千美金一个月

translation.en: How can you put a price on privacy like that? Freedom?
translation.zh:
住那种地方
怎么能维护好自己的隐私和自由？
你独用的卫生间？干净的毛巾？

translation.en: Oh, hey. What about Beachwood Canyon?
...you really should get a car first.
I mean, this is L.A. after all. You know?
...and let you stay a little bit longer.
Throw in something for rent, we're good.
-A second ago you wanted me out. -I don't like my towel wet.
translation.zh:
-一秒钟前你还想让我走
-我只是不喜欢你用我的毛巾

translation.en: I don't like the lack of privacy...
translation.zh: 我不喜欢隐私受到干扰

translation.en: And I'm the kind of guy...
...when a friend is in trouble, I help.
translation.zh: 朋友有难我不能袖手旁观

translation.en: What did Natalie have to say?
Nothing. No, she.... What did she say?
Her play got extended three months.
She has to pay everything there in rent...
...so I have to cover everything here.
So if you wanna stick around and chip in, it would--
translation.zh:
如果你愿意住下来
并付部分房租，就能...

translation.en: Well, will you look at that?
The shoe on the other foot.
translation.zh: 现在占据有利位置的人是我
之前我还是位不速之客...

translation.en: ...I'm the only thing standing between you and eviction.
translation.zh: 我是唯一能让你有地方住的人
看啊，〝热水浴缸，比佛利山庄〞

translation.en: All right. You can have my bedroom.
See, I'm the kind of girl...
...if a friend's in trouble, I help.
translation.zh: 朋友有难我绝对不会袖手旁观

translation.en: It's something about the two mortgages.
To be perfectly honest, I haven't got a goddamn clue.
translation.zh: 老实说，我不知道是怎么回事

translation.en: But if I can't raise the amount of money...
...on that paper by the end of this month, I lose the club.
translation.zh:
月底之前我凑不到纸上写的那些钱
俱乐部就要易主了

translation.en: ...but do you think I could do it?
translation.zh: 你觉得我能凑到这笔钱？

translation.en: I need your expert sewing skills.
translation.zh: 我需要你专业的缝纫技术

translation.en: Wait a minute. Hey, hey. What's in that?
Iced tea, my ass. Go home.
Yeah, right. I'm about to go on.
You're not gonna go on. Go home.
Relax. It is one drink. What is the big deal?
translation.zh: 别紧张，不过是一杯酒，没关系的

translation.en: Ali, you're gonna take Nikki's spot.
-She can't dance my part. -She can and she will.
translation.zh:
-她怎么能跳我的位置
-她可以

translation.en: No, no. My God, I can't do that. It is Nikki's number.
translation.zh: 天呐，不行，那支舞是妮基的

translation.en: You said you can do any number, right?
-I don't wanna step on any toes. -Then don't.
translation.zh:
-我不想取代别人的位置
-那就别这么做

translation.en: I don't ca-- Listen to me.
You're gonna go on, and you're gonna go home.
Tess wants to see you. Says it's urgent.
Don't say I didn't warn you.
Everybody wants Dave to do something.
Y'all gonna have me singing by the time I'm done here. Jesus.
translation.zh: 等下忙完这边你们还得要我唱歌吧

translation.en: What are you doing back here?
-Nikki said you were looking for me. -Nikki? What is going on?
translation.zh:
-妮基说你找我？
-妮基？怎么回事？

translation.en: Am I the only one that has no idea what just happened?
translation.zh: 搞不清状况的只有我一个人吗？

translation.en: The music stopped, I didn't know what to do.
translation.zh: 音乐停了，我不知道该怎么做

translation.en: I had to sing, I'm sorry.
Never told me you could sing like that.
translation.zh: 你从来没告诉过我你这么会唱

translation.en: This is what we're gonna do. You know the songs, right?
translation.zh: 这么做，你们都知道这首歌吧

translation.en: So tomorrow we're gonna rehearse, then you're gonna sing.
translation.zh:
明天我们整天彩排
明天晚上你来唱

translation.en: We're gonna go straight through the show live.
Okay, good. Good. You go with the guys.
Find out what keys you're comfortable singing in...
translation.zh: 找到你觉得合适的调子

translation.en: ...and I'm going to go up to my office and plan an entirely new show.
translation.zh: 我去办公室准备全新的表演

translation.en: I'm gonna build a show around her.
translation.zh: 我要为她编排一个节目

translation.en: "They don't come to hear us sing"?
They'll come to hear her sing.

translation.zh:
-非常棒
-我从来没见过这么精彩的表演

translation.en: Thanks. Are you sure Tess really liked it? She wasn't...?
I was bringing down the curtain.
She stopped me. She's the one who let you sing.
translation.zh: 她阻止了我，让你唱歌的人是她

translation.en: -Really? -She wants to build a show around you.
translation.zh:
-是吗？
-她想为你编排一个节目
你这是喜悦的眼泪对吗？

translation.en: Clearly one of us has underestimated the other.
translation.zh: 看来我们有人低估了对方的实力

translation.en: I can't believe Tess has you buried in the kick line.
translation.zh: 没想到泰丝一直埋没了你的才能

translation.en: And you are way too good to be doing it here.

translation.zh: 就和杰克说是我让你去的

translation.en: Where the hell did that come from?
-Who knew that you could do that? -Thanks, Jack.
translation.zh:
-谁知道你能这么会唱？
-谢谢，杰克

translation.en: Who knew any white chick could sing like that?
translation.zh: 没有别的白人女孩能唱得这么好

translation.en: I don't know. It just happens. I just do it.
translation.zh: 我不知道，自然而然就会唱了

translation.en: I know how that feels. I gotta pee again, so....
translation.zh:
我能体会那种感觉
我又要去卫生间了，所以...

translation.en: We're gonna get something to eat.
Well, no, just the way you're gazing after her.
translation.zh: 没什么，只是你看她的样子

translation.en: Yes. No, I do. I know. Three thousand miles away.
translation.zh: 我知道，她在三千英里之外

translation.en: Let me guess, don't tell me.
All I'm saying is that that one there...
...is beautiful on the inside as well...
translation.zh: 她不只是有漂亮的外表

translation.en: ...and she's not going to be available forever.
Relationship advice from Mr. One-Night-Stand himself.
I was just telling Jack here how every opportunity has a shelf life.
translation.zh:
我在告诉杰克
所有的机会都是有期限的

translation.en: No, I'm not cutting my hair.
translation.zh: 不行，我不想剪我的头发

translation.en: Who said anything about you cutting your hair? You can wear a wig.
translation.zh: 谁说要你剪头发，可以戴假发

translation.en: Where have I been all my life?

translation.zh: 我的戒指是韦斯特设计的

translation.en: They all say, "Darling, what did you Do for those pearls?"
translation.zh:
他们都说
〝怎么把珍珠做成这个样子〞

translation.en: It's not like we're brother and sister.
I don't get why everyone's having a conniption.
translation.zh: 怎么每个人都那么狂热？

translation.en: She's just a tacky farm girl from Iowa.
translation.zh:
她不过是个
来自爱荷华的俗气乡下姑娘

translation.en: And we know a cow when we see one.
translation.zh: 我们看到母牛时认得出
别低估我们这些乡下姑娘

translation.en: It's either you or the auction house.
translation.zh: 不管给你还是给拍卖行

translation.en: Know what happens when you default on a loan?
translation.zh: 你知道不付贷款的后果吗？

translation.en: I'm not screwing around. Where's the money coming from?
translation.zh: 我没在搅事，钱从哪儿来？

translation.en: Ali's a hit. We can charge 50 bucks a head now.
translation.zh:
爱丽就是一个办法
现在可以每人收费五十美金

translation.en: Raising the admission? That's not good enough.
You have been saying that the sky is falling forever.
translation.zh: 你一直说天要塌下来了

translation.en: Tell that to the people losing everything.
translation.zh: 告诉那些正在失去一切的人

translation.en: I don't wanna be one of them.
-I love this place too. -No, you don't.
translation.zh:
-我也对这个地方有深厚的感情
-你没有

translation.en: Look, you have many fine qualities, Vincent.
And then you've got some iffy qualities.
But you've never been a phony.
translation.zh: 但是你绝对不会是个骗子

translation.en: I'm in here. Can you come zip me up?
translation.zh: 我在这里，能帮我拉一下拉链吗？

translation.en: Me and my mom on my 7th birthday.
translation.zh: 我和我母亲在我七岁的时候照的

translation.en: She died a few weeks later.
translation.zh: 几个星期后她就去世了

translation.en: Every single day something happens that I wish I could tell her about.
translation.zh: 每次发生点什么事我都想告诉她

translation.en: You should get that. It's probably Natalie.
translation.zh: 你去接电话吧，可能是娜塔莉
我快饿死了，你准备好了吗？

translation.en: I can't. I'm so sorry. I have to do inventory tonight.
translation.zh: 不行，抱歉，我今晚要点货

translation.en: Want me to call a cab?
No, that's okay. I'll get a ride with Coco.
translation.zh: 不用，没关系，我坐可可的车

translation.en: I was coming to talk to you. I caught your conversation.
translation.zh: 我过来找你，正好听到你们的谈话

translation.en: -Talk to me about...? -Dinner. With me. Give me that.
translation.zh:
-找我干什么？
-和我一起吃晚饭，给我

translation.en: If you ever expect to see this bag alive again...
Hold on a second. Where you going? Hey!
Where are you taking me? This is not the way to my place.
translation.zh: 你带我去哪里？我家不是这个方向
刚才告诉你了，去吃晚饭

translation.en: I'm not going to dinner with you. You're seeing Nikki.
translation.zh:
我不想和你吃晚饭
你还在和妮基约会

translation.en: Where I come from, friends don't chew on earlobes.
translation.zh:
我长大的地方
朋友不会咬对方的耳垂

translation.en: I gotta make a quick appearance at a party.
translation.zh: 刚想起来我得去一个派对露下面

translation.en: It's on the way. We'll be quick. Ten minutes, tops. Do you mind?
translation.zh:
正好顺路，很快的
最多十分钟，可以吗？

translation.en: What are you doing? You can't just take that.
translation.zh: 你在干什么？你不能就这么拿走

translation.en: Put that back. You're gonna get us kicked out.
translation.zh: 放回去，我们会被赶出去的

translation.en: Hey, hey. Greg, Marla, this is Ali.
translation.zh: 你们好，格雷格，马勒，这是爱丽

translation.en: My God, those are amazing shoes.
Always good to have you, man.
Wait a minute. You had to make an appearance at your own party?
translation.zh: 等等，你得在你自己的派对上露面

translation.en: Would've been rude not to, right?
You'd like those guys. Greg's an editor, Marla's a designer.
translation.zh:
你会喜欢他们的
格雷格是编辑，马勒是设计师

translation.en: I'm gonna dream about those shoes.
L.A. looks gorgeous from up here.
translation.zh: 从这里看洛杉矶太美了

translation.en: That view cost me three times what the house did.
translation.zh: 这个风景让我多付了三倍的钱

translation.en: See that strip mall down there?
No. I own everything above it.
translation.zh: 不是，我拥有以上的一切

translation.en: Guy that owns the mall ran into money issues, almost had to sell.
translation.zh:
拥有商业街的人因为经济问题
差点要把它卖掉

translation.en: Whoever he sold to would've put up a huge tower.
So I bought the air rights.
-No one can build above one story. -Well, aren't you clever.
translation.zh:
-他们只能建一层楼的建筑
-你太聪明了

translation.en: Mall guy gets to keep his property, I keep the second best view in L.A.
translation.zh:
拥有商业街的人不用变卖他的财产
我可以保全洛杉矶第二美的景色

translation.en: -How many girls you used that line on? -None who called me on it.
translation.zh:
-你对多少女人说过这些话？
-我记得没有

translation.en: And why should I tell you?
You're talented enough to get what you want...
translation.zh:
因为你有足够的才能
去得到你想要的一切

translation.en: ...and I'm smart enough to make it happen.
translation.zh: 我有足够的智慧去实现它们

translation.en: -Come on, open it. -Let's see. Come on.
Let's go. Girls, please, break it up.

translation.zh: 可可，走吧，只剩五分钟了

translation.en: My nana used to call me Ali Cat.
translation.zh: 我奶奶以前总叫我爱丽猫

translation.en: -Why don't I have a nickname? -Oh, you do.
-Well, he never uses it. -No, I do.
So sorry! I had no idea! Oh, my God.
Girls, come on! We have a show to do! Let's go, let's go!
It's a cold and crazy world That's raging outside
translation.zh: 这个寒冷疯狂的世界正在咆哮

translation.en: But, baby, me and all my girls Are bringin' on the fire
translation.zh: 不过我和姑娘们正在火炉边

translation.en: Show a little leg Gotta shimmy your chest
translation.zh:
露一点腿
在你面前尽情摇摆

translation.en: It's a life, it's a style, it's a need
translation.zh: 这是生活，这是潮流，这是需要

translation.en: You were out late last night.
translation.zh: 你昨天晚上回来得很晚

translation.en: Oh, I got a ride home with that guy...
There's only one reason a man buys a woman shoes.
translation.zh: 男人给女人买鞋子只有一个原因

translation.en: So what if I'm getting a little male attention?
translation.zh: 受到一点异性关注又有什么关系

translation.en: You're getting more than a little.
I just think you should be careful.
translation.zh: 我只是觉得你要谨慎点

translation.en: And I think if you need to tell a girl what she should and shouldn't do...
translation.zh: 如果你想给一个女人意见...

translation.en: ...you should pick up the phone and call your fiancée.
translation.zh: 还是给你未婚妻打电话吧

translation.en: Major? Check again. The only thing major is the size of Coco's ass.
translation.zh:
头条？
占版面最大的就是可可的屁股

translation.en: Monsieur Louboutin is at Table 18 and he's asking for you.
translation.zh: 十八桌的鲁布托先生找你

translation.en: I'm so glad you got to--
There she is, the girl of the hour.

translation.zh: 你真是会想尽一切办法

translation.en: I just made a call to Greg at the Times.
translation.zh:
我刚给《时代杂志》的
格雷格打了电话

translation.en: I want you to meet a friend of mine. Ali Rose, Harold Saint.
translation.zh:
这是我的朋友爱丽露丝
这位是哈罗德圣特

translation.en: Harold--? Shut up. You worked with Etta James.
translation.zh:
哈罗德？不是吧
你和伊塔詹姆斯共事

translation.en: Her. Chewed me up and spat me out, that one.
translation.zh:
就是她
她很难搞的

translation.en: You've got a set of pipes too, young lady.
We have to do something about that.
You snooze, you lose, pretty boy.
translation.zh: 你一不留神就要输了，帅小伙

translation.en: But I just got another notice from the bank.
translation.zh: 不过我又收到银行的通知

translation.en: We would have to fill Dodger Stadium for a month to come up with the cash.
translation.zh:
我们得有连续一个月装满
道奇体育馆的顾客才能凑上这笔钱

translation.en: I gotta figure out a way to buy us more time.
That really is a great shot.
It's so weird seeing myself in the paper like that.
translation.zh: 在报纸上看到自己感觉很奇怪

translation.en: Well, you might have to get used to it.
I don't think I ever could.
You know, I don't wanna come off like the wise old fairy godmother...
...but maybe you could learn from my mistakes.
translation.zh: 不过也许你能吸取我的教训

translation.en: You gotta learn who are the people you can trust...
translation.zh: 你得分清楚哪些人是值得信任的...

translation.en: ...the people who like you for you...
...and who are the people who just want something.
-You don't like Marcus, do you? -No, I don't.
I don't like him. I don't trust him.
I don't think you should trust him.
translation.zh: 我觉得你也不该相信他

translation.en: But is that really what's best for me or what's best for you?
translation.zh: 这是为你好还是为我好？

translation.en: I hope it's best for both of us.
translation.zh: 希望对我们两个人都好

translation.en: These babies desperately need your glue gun, okay?
translation.zh: 这些衣服得用胶粘一下

translation.en: I got that track you wanted to rehearse for tomorrow.
translation.zh: 我找到了你想要的明天排练的曲子

translation.en: Honey, I'm sorry. I got a million things on my mind and I completely forgot.
translation.zh: 宝贝，对不起，事情太多我忘了

translation.en: If it's too late I can come in early tomorrow?
translation.zh: 如果现在太晚了我明天早点过来？

translation.en: No, no. Let's just get it out of the way.
But there's still something so strong

translation.zh: 但总有一天我会有重新站起来

translation.en: Don't count me out just yet
Way past the point of breakin'
You haven't seen the last of me
You haven't seen the last of me
But I'm gonna stand my ground
You don't know who I am
Don't count me out so fast
translation.zh: 别这么快就以为我已出局

translation.en: Way past the point of breakin'
You haven't seen the last of me
I'm down now But I'll be standin' tall again
translation.zh:
现在我在沉沦
但总有一天我会有重新站起来

translation.en: Times are hard but I was built tough
translation.zh: 虽然难熬但我不会服输

translation.en: I'm gonna show you all What I'm made of
translation.zh: 我要让你们知道我是谁

translation.en: Way past the point of breakin'
You haven't seen the last of me
No, no, I'm not goin' nowhere
Oh, no, you won't see me fade out
You haven't seen the last of me
Oh, no, you haven't seen The last of me
translation.zh: 不，不，你还没见过最后的我

translation.en: You haven't seen the last of me
Well, then you can just listen.

translation.zh: 我们一起创立这个俱乐部

translation.en: ...and then some girl shows up from nowhere...
translation.zh: 这个不知道从哪里窜出来的姑娘

translation.en: -...who hasn't paid her dues-- -How do you know?
translation.zh:
-她甚至还没尝过苦头...
-你怎么知道她尝过什么苦头？

translation.en: Doesn't sing that way because she's had it easy.
translation.zh: 她歌唱得好不代表她的人生就顺利

translation.en: "They don't come to hear us sing, Nikki."
translation.zh:
〝他们不是来听我们唱歌的
妮基〞

translation.en: Or is that just bullshit now?
You're drunk. Go inside and call a cab.
translation.zh: 你醉了，进去叫辆出租车

translation.en: I will not be upstaged by some slut!
translation.zh: 我不想被那个贱人比下去

translation.en: You'd ruin our friendship over some girl you barely know?
translation.zh:
为了一个新人
你毁了我们之间的友谊？

translation.en: Since when did you know anything about loyalty?
How many times have I peeled you off the sidewalk?
translation.zh: 多少次我把你从路边扶起来？
多少次你晕倒是我帮了你？

translation.en: How many times have I held your head...
translation.zh: 多少次你喝醉吐得不省人事...

translation.en: ...while you threw up everything but memories?
Okay, fine! But I will not stand in the back!
translation.zh: 好吧，但是我得站在前面

translation.en: Tess, you need to fix this--
translation.zh: 泰丝，你得解决这个问题

translation.en: You think you're my only problem? I'm about to lose my club.
translation.zh:
你以为你是我唯一的问题？
我就要失去我的俱乐部了

translation.en: The only thing that means anything to me.
translation.zh: 这是唯一对我有意义的东西

translation.en: I have more to worry about than you pouring tequila on your Cheerios.
translation.zh: 除了你的酗酒我还有别的事要担心

translation.en: ...I slept with Vince the night after your honeymoon.
translation.zh:
你们蜜月结束后的那个晚上
我和文思上床了

translation.en: Do you really have to do that at 6 a.m.?
translation.zh: 你需要在早上六点做这个？

translation.en: No, but a little peace and quiet would be nice.
translation.zh: 不用，不过要是安静点就好了

translation.en: You are a little overdressed for breakfast.
translation.zh: 穿这个吃早饭太隆重了吧

translation.en: My pajamas were in the bedroom, which was occupied.
translation.zh:
我的睡衣在房间里
有人霸占

translation.en: You're never here, so it'd be stupid for me to crash on the couch...
translation.zh: 你总不在，有着空床不睡...

translation.en: ...when there is a perfectly good, empty bed right there.
So, what, do you want the bedroom back?
Maybe not when you think I should be. You are my roommate, not my mother.
translation.zh:
也许没有按照你希望的时间
你是我的室友，不是我母亲

translation.en: However, since it's such an issue....
What the hell. Take the bedroom. I'll sleep on the couch.
translation.zh: 不管了，你睡卧室我睡沙发

translation.en: -You're gonna have to move your shit. -I realize.
translation.zh:
-你得把你的东西搬走
-我知道

translation.en: It is a total mess in there.
You got stuff everywhere. Clothes, shoes, hair--
translation.zh:
到处是你的东西
衣服，鞋子，头发

translation.en: Jesus! What is your problem? You're acting like a prick.
translation.zh:
天呐，你怎么回事
听起来像个混蛋

translation.en: The people that care about you are worried.
translation.zh: 在乎你的人都很担心你

translation.en: People, you know? People. Your friends at the club.
And we look out for each other.
You look out for each other. Like Vince looks after Tess.
translation.zh:
大家都相互照应
就像文思照顾泰丝

translation.en: And like Nikki looks out for everybody.
And Marcus? He's gonna look out for you?
He can make things happen for you.
So go ahead, make a deal with the devil.
First, Marcus is not the devil.
...who happens to be a gentleman who knows what he wants and goes for it.
translation.zh:
他是一个知道自己要什么
就去做什么的绅士

translation.en: I'm just saying. Life is about the choices you make.
...who writes songs that are never ready.
translation.zh: 写的歌从来都不能发表

translation.en: Please, try not to destroy my apartment. Thanks.
translation.zh: 请不要损坏我的公寓，谢谢

translation.en: I now pronounce you husband and wife.
translation.zh: 我现在宣布你们结为夫妻

translation.en: Wait, what do you mean you are still in New York? Why?
translation.zh: 等等，你还在纽约，为什么？

translation.en: So you just decided not to come?
Why does every conversation we have end up being about your future?
translation.zh:
为什么我们的谈话
总会说到你的将来？

translation.en: We should start thinking about our futures.
translation.zh: 我们确实得好好考虑我们的将来

translation.en: And I might be looking at mine right now.
translation.zh: 我现在也要考虑我的将来

translation.en: Maybe he's cuckoo for Coco Puffs.
translation.zh: 也许他感兴趣的是可可泡芙

translation.en: He's gorgeous. I think he likes me.
translation.zh: 他长得很帅，我想他对我有意思

translation.en: Who is paying for this wedding? This rental must have cost a fortune.
translation.zh:
这个婚礼由谁来买单？
这个场地的租金肯定不菲

translation.en: Guess Georgia's not as dumb as I thought.
Would you ever do this again?
There's only one man I could see spending the rest of my life with.
translation.zh: 我认为能共度余生的男人只有一个

translation.en: And unfortunately, except for a really drunk night in Reno 25,000 years ago...
translation.zh:
可惜除了很久以前
在里诺喝醉的一个晚上除外

translation.en: Oh, no. He bats for the pink team.
Well, it's like all truly great love affairs.
translation.zh: 和所有伟大的爱情故事一样

translation.en: It wasn't Reno. It was Tahoe, baby.
Make it two. Make it two.
Looking kind of lonely there, Jack.
God. What are we, in junior high?
Iowa, are you still mad at me?
translation.zh: 爱荷华，你还在生我的气吗？

translation.en: You know, because if you are...
Oh, I love this song. Yes!
I'm sorry for being a class-A prick.
...some time ago, I am officially a single man.
Which explains why I am here alone.
Do I really look alone to you?
translation.zh: 我看起来像是孤单的样子吗？

translation.en: Oh, my feet are killing me. Take off these shoes, please. Help me.
translation.zh: 我的脚好疼，请帮我把鞋脱掉

translation.en: My mother got me these, thank you very much.
And I haven't worn them yet, so....
I forgot to lock the door.
Now, I know-- I know I forgot something else.
I remember I locked the door.
It's your loss. You change your mind...

translation.zh:
要是改变主意了
你知道饼干放在哪里

translation.en: My heart and I were buried in dust
translation.zh: 之前我的心和我满是尘埃

translation.en: I found a man I can trust
translation.zh: 我找到了能信赖的男人

translation.en: And, boy, I believe in us
I am terrified to love For the first time
Can you see That I'm bound in chains

translation.zh: 我终于找到自己想要的

translation.en: I mean, I don't really know what happened.
translation.zh: 我不知道是怎么发生的

translation.en: I had won the Nashville Teen Songwriting Contest.
translation.zh: 我赢了纳什维尔青少年谱曲大赛

translation.en: I even still have my little trophy.
I thought I was supposed to do something important with my life.
I believe your music is ready.
translation.zh: 我相信你的曲子已经能发表了

translation.en: -For what? -Are you ready? Here I come.
translation.zh:
-准备好干什么？
-准备好了吗？我来了

translation.en: You are a liar. A pathetic, sneaky little liar!
translation.zh: 你这个骗子，可怜的骗子

translation.en: I live here. I wanna know why you are here.
translation.zh:
我住在这里
我想知道你为什么在这里

translation.en: I can't believe I bought your bullshit. "She's nothing. She's not even pretty."
translation.zh:
我居然会相信你的谎话
〝她不过是个同事，她长得一般〞

translation.en: Well, at least you were honest about one thing.
I'm sorry, could you just give me some time--?
-You told me you broke it off with her. -I did.
You break up with me over the phone?
translation.zh: 就为了她你一通电话就和我分手了

translation.en: -I'm out of here. You told me it was over. -No. Ali.
translation.zh:
-我走了，你说你们已经结束了
-别走，爱丽

translation.en: I must have the wrong apartment.
-What are you doing here? -It's a long story.
I see I've obviously interrupted something.
I'm sorry. Ali, did you meet...
Yeah. Why don't I go make the coffee...
Sorry. Did I call you Mike last night?

translation.zh:
-不过我还叫你约翰，所以...
-真的？
你还好吗？听起来好像心情不太好

translation.en: Well, I have just the cure.
Why don't you come over for dinner?
I told you that opportunity wouldn't knock forever.
translation.zh: 我说了机会不会永远等着你的

translation.en: Do you want to have some lunch?
I just wasted my whole goddamn afternoon...
translation.zh: 我浪费了整个下午时间...

translation.en: ...talking with the vice president of loans.
This asshole-- No, wait. He didn't even look me in the eye.
translation.zh: 这个混蛋，都不正眼看我

translation.en: He just sat there, playing with this wooden thingy on his desk.
translation.zh: 他就坐那里摆弄他桌上的木头

translation.en: -What thingy? What? -The long wooden block thingy.
translation.zh:
-木头，什么？
-一个长方形木头块

translation.en: And he's not gonna give me the money.
And I've got two days before the bank takes the club.
translation.zh: 只剩两天银行就要收走俱乐部

translation.en: ...I would say that the situation is pretty bleak.
And I would say that you are a master of the fucking obvious.
translation.zh: 我会说你绝对是说废话的高手

translation.en: What do you mean, "Why did I say that"? Because it's the truth.
Tess, it's not a judgment, it's the truth.
translation.zh: 泰丝，这不是我的评论，是事实

translation.en: The bank won't give you a loan. It's the eleventh hour.
translation.zh:
银行不会贷款给你
现在是晚上十一点

translation.en: If I were you, I would take Marcus's offer now.
translation.zh:
如果我是你
我会接受马科斯的提议

translation.en: And you don't get to say that to me.
I can take "the sky is falling" from everyone else, but not you.
translation.zh:
谁都可以说〝天要塌下来了〞
只有你不能说

translation.en: You know, I need you to be the one that says:
We have killed ourselves to keep this place going.
translation.zh: 我们为这个俱乐部呕心沥血

translation.en: How can you just walk away?
I don't care if you walk away, I don't care what happens.
translation.zh:
不管你是否会一走了之
不管会发生什么

translation.en: I will beat down the door of every bank in L.A.
translation.zh: 我会敲洛杉矶每家银行的门

translation.en: I will never give up this club.
translation.zh: 我绝对不会放弃这家俱乐部

translation.en: I will never give it up.
I thought I'd lost you for a minute at the beginning there.
translation.zh: 我刚来的时候还以为你已经放弃了

translation.en: When it grows up it'll be multi-use space...
translation.zh: 建起来后将是多功能空间...

translation.en: But this is the Burlesque Lounge.
Best view on the Sunset Strip...
When I'm through with it, it'll have a thousand.
translation.zh: 等我买下来，会有很多窗户

translation.en: -Tess knows I've made an offer to buy. -What makes you think she'd sell?
translation.zh:
-泰丝知道我出价买她的俱乐部
-她怎么会卖呢？

translation.en: I don't think she has a choice. She's going under.
translation.zh: 她别无选择，我的出价非常慷慨

translation.en: It's a win-win situation for everyone. It's business, not personal.
translation.zh:
这是个双赢的提议
这是生意，不针对个人

translation.en: I think it's personal for Tess.
translation.zh: 对泰丝来说是很个人的

translation.en: And for Coco and Sean and....
There are other clubs that you can sing and dance in. Better ones.
translation.zh: 还有很多你能唱歌跳舞的俱乐部

translation.en: I don't understand. I'm trying to do something that benefits everyone.
translation.zh:
我搞不懂
我在做的事对每个人都有利

translation.en: -How does that make me the bad guy? -It doesn't, Marcus.
translation.zh:
-为什么让我成了坏人
-没有，马科斯

translation.en: It just makes you the wrong guy.
So how'd it go at the bank?
You want a glass for that?
No, no. I am way beyond a glass.
-Tess, I gotta talk to you. -Not right now.
translation.zh:
-泰丝，我要和你谈谈
-现在不行

translation.en: Marcus is gonna tear down the club and build a skyscraper.
translation.zh: 马科斯准备移平俱乐部建摩天大楼

translation.en: And how do you know this?
-I saw the model. -I didn't know you were close.
translation.zh:
-我看到了模型
-原来你们这么熟

translation.en: We're not. I rushed over so I could tell you.
translation.zh: 我们不熟，我特意跑过来告诉你...

translation.en: You're spreading yourself a little bit thin.

translation.zh: 杰克，马科斯，或者还有别的人

translation.en: Tess, I'm trying to help you.
Okay. Let it go, let it go.
Well, she's gonna hear me. Watch this.
Tess, I gotta talk to you.
-You could knock. This is still my office. -You need to hear what I tell you.
translation.zh:
-进来前要敲门，这还是我的办公室
-你必须得听我说的

translation.en: I don't. I am tired of talking. I am talked out.
-Hear me out. -I don't wanna hear you out.
Do you ever listen to anything other than your own voice?
translation.zh: 你有听过自己以外的意见吗？

translation.en: Have you ever heard of air rights?
No, I've never heard of air rights. What are air rights?
Jim, let me call you back, huh?
translation.zh: 吉姆，我一会儿给你电话

translation.en: A few years ago you wanted to buy my club and I said no.
translation.zh:
几年前
你说要买我的俱乐部，我拒绝了

translation.en: Yeah, and now you changed your mind?
No, but just bear with me for a second...
...because I promise this is gonna have a happy ending for both of us.
translation.zh: 我保证这将对我们都有利

translation.en: How much you planning to sell your condos for?
translation.zh: 你的公寓准备卖多少钱？

translation.en: Well, they start at a million and go up from there, depending on the view.
translation.zh:
从一百万起价
景色越好价格越高

translation.en: So, what if I told you that a 20-story office building...
translation.zh:
如果我告诉你... 我的俱乐部上面
将建一栋二十层的办公楼

translation.en: ...was going up where my club is?
translation.zh:
我的俱乐部上面
将建一栋二十层的办公楼
这栋大楼会挡住公寓的风景

translation.en: -Ten stories would block his view. -Yeah. Gone.
The way I see it, your beautiful million-dollar ocean and city views...
translation.zh:
在我看来，你价值百万的
海景和都市景色...

translation.en: ...are just gonna vanish into thin air.
Because tomorrow I am going to sell my club to this developer...
translation.zh:
因为明天我要把我的俱乐部
卖给这位开发商

translation.en: ...and his 20 stories are gonna be well underway by the time you start selling.
translation.zh:
等你公寓建好出售的时候
他的二十层楼办公楼正好在建

translation.en: And so I think that we should talk.
translation.zh: 所以我想我们应该谈谈
如果我是你我会听她的话

translation.en: We're gonna have to auction off everything.
Anything you want me to keep for you?
translation.zh: 有什么想让我帮你留下吗？

translation.en: I just wanna try and do what's best for both of us.
translation.zh: 只希望符合我们的最大利益

translation.en: No. I'm gonna buy you out.
translation.zh: 不是，我要买下你的股份
你从哪里弄来这么多钱？

translation.en: Just put it out in the universe.
What would really make me so happy...
I didn't sleep with Vince, I just said that to hurt you.
translation.zh:
我没和文思上过床
我是为了气你才这么说的

translation.en: Now get your ass upstairs and get ready, you're on in 20 minutes.
translation.zh: 上楼准备，二十分钟后上场

translation.en: And if you ever pull half of the crap that she pulled...
translation.zh: 如果你做出比她一半糟糕的事...

translation.en: ...you are gonna be out so quick it's gonna make your head spin.
translation.zh: 你还没反应过来就会被踢出去

translation.en: And don't ever call me "ma'am" again.
I'm gonna go get dressed for the show.
So this is what happens when you get a little money?
I'm back there with broken zippers...
...and ostrich feather fans that won't open or close.
translation.zh: 和坏掉的鸵鸟羽毛扇的活又丢给我

translation.en: You have no idea what it's like. No idea.
translation.zh: 你不知道这是什么感觉

translation.en: -Can I use this? -Don't touch my stuff.
translation.zh:
-我能用这个吗？
-别碰我的东西

translation.en: I really have to get ready.
I know I messed up, okay? Bigtime.
translation.zh: 我知道我错了，大错特错

translation.en: When? When you lied to me about your engagement being over...
translation.zh: 什么错？是你骗我你们解除婚约...

translation.en: It really was over. Okay? And she's gone.
I never should have let you walk out that door.
translation.zh: 我不该让你离开那扇门

translation.en: I want you to come back.
...I still have that full box of cookies.
So are you in or are you out?
...I'm the kind of girl that, when a friend's in trouble, I help.
translation.zh: 朋友有难我不能袖手旁观

translation.en: There is a world few know about
translation.zh: 有一个不为人知的世界

translation.en: And you can't keep a good girl down
translation.zh: 好女孩也不会为你消沉

translation.en: Baby doll just come to life
All the girls wanna fall in line
translation.zh: 所有姑娘都想与她共舞

translation.en: Here come the ladies 'Bout to give a little show
translation.zh: 这就是将要表演的姑娘们

translation.en: Here go the boys They're gonna show a little more
translation.zh: 男孩们看好，她们会大显身手

translation.en: Hit it up, get it up Won't let you rest
Hit it up, get it up This is not a test
Hit it up, get it up Gotta give me your best
translation.zh: 努力加油，展示最好的你

translation.en: So get your ass up Show me how you burlesque
translation.zh: 起来向我展示你的舞娘风情
